Detailed Description

template<class LifePolicy, class PositionPolicy, class SizePolicy, class VelocityPolicy, class ColorPolicy>
class mdragon::CompletePolicy< LifePolicy, PositionPolicy, SizePolicy, VelocityPolicy, ColorPolicy >

CompletePolicy represents template class that provides implementation of policies container to store complete policies.

This template class have to be initialized by template parameters.

Parameters:

PositionPolicy - position policy.
SizePolicy - size policy.
VelocityPolicy - velocity policy.
ColorPolicy - color policy.
